name: DAYTONA USA
description:
It’s time to get revved up with DAYTONA® USA! Based on the classic arcade title, DAYTONA® USA features enhanced graphics, tracks for all skill levels, and the original hit soundtrack!
Save your quarters - we’re bringing the arcade straight to your living room with steering wheel and multiplayer support. Challenge your friends in up to eight player online races or the whole world via online leaderboards!
New Coat of Paint:
Now with enhanced graphics, DAYTONA® USA gives you a classically updated, retro look in 16:9 widescreen.
Classic Arcade Experience:
Race your AI opponents in classic Arcade Mode, beat the clock in Survival and Time Trial modes or sing along to your favorite DAYTONA® songs in Karaoke mode!
